thread.title: Pandora launch huge spring sale with up to 60% off - get charms from £10 plus half price rings

author: Molly Holt
title: Pandora launch huge spring sale with up to 60% off - get charms from £10 plus half price rings
text:
Abundance of Love ring , £29 (was £45) Sophisticated, understated and incredibly pretty 
Show her how much she means to you with shimmering hearts - now 35% off. You can also get it for just £19 at official stockist Argento . Go from day to night in these sparklers, which have 35% off 
Channel spring's new beginnings with these playful butterfly earrings. Although they're only £25 a Argento right now... There's 35% off this meaningful bracelet 
Hand-finished, stone-studded love letters to always remind your loved ones how much they mean to you. Read More White Primrose ring , £19 (was £45) A pretty primrose flower makes for a delicate accessory 
Get 57% off this minimalist ring with a single, pearly flower that looks just as good stacked as it does alone. It also comes in grey and green variations 
Ideal for charms, the simple black strand design makes it the perfect casual accessory - currently half price. Read More
